title: EPISTOLA John P. Jehu
html:
EPISTOLA John P. Jehu

I would add the German word Kafer to the list in Mr. E. E. Rehmus' penultimate paragraph of “La Cucuracha” [III, 3]. [John P. Jehu, Albany, New York].
